solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int subarraySum(int[] nums, int k) {--newline--        int sum = 0, result = 0;--newline--        Map<Integer, Integer> preSum = new HashMap<>();--newline--        preSum.put(0, 1);--newline--        --newline--        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {--newline--            sum += nums[i];--newline--            if (preSum.containsKey(sum - k)) {--newline--                result += preSum.get(sum - k);--newline--            }--newline--            preSum.put(sum, preSum.getOrDefault(sum, 0) + 1);--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
